CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 28, 1963, pg. 13, reads: "Jazz Break - Offering a little entertainment on the light side was Rinkydink Rubye [Ruby] Young, shown here at the organ in her spacious Schenley Heights home, the setting for the 'Showcase on Art.'  She is a well-known and accomplished musician. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ruby Young Buchanan Hardy in satin gown playing organ in her home, Schenley Heights
